item.title: Back to glory 90's
item.description: The Year was 1998 (or so) - Your humble servant was merely scratching the surface of programming landscape. I’ve started my journey by writing some BASIC programs… on a sheet of paper. Couple months later I’ve switched to Pascal. Those memories were brought to live when charity campaign #code16challenge was launched. Whole IT community was posting code snippets and sharing fundraising (for expensive treatment of 10 months old Maja). I’ve decided to dust my Pascal knowledge off and see if I can put together few lines of code.
